鸜鸜鸜

鸜字的基本解释

鸜
qú
古同“鴝”。

鸜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qú］
［《廣韻》其俱切，平虞，羣。］
［《廣韻》古侯切，平侯，見。］
“鸲1”的繁体字。亦作“鸜1”。
鸟类的一属。体小，尾长，羽毛美丽，嘴短而尖。参见“鴝掇”、“鴝眼”。
[②]［gōu］
［《集韻》居矦切，平矦，見。］
“鸲2”的繁体字。
见“鴝2鶹”。
[③]［gòu］
［《集韻》居切，去，見。］
“鸲3”的繁体字。
雉鸣。

鸜字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鸜； 康熙笔画：29； 页码：页1504第40
【玉篇】同鴝。鸛鵒，鳥名。【周禮·冬官考工記】鸜鵒不踰濟。【春秋·昭二十五年】鸜鵒來巢。【陸佃云】里兒剔其舌端，敎以語言，甚慧。【李時珍曰】此鳥好浴水，其睛瞿瞿然，故名。又複姓。鸜鵲子。見【莊子·齊物論】。

鸜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鸜字的起名意思

暂无。

Yu
Basic explanation of words
Yu
qú
The ancient same "robin".
Yu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qú］
["Guangyun" all cut, Pingyu, group. ]
["Guangyun" Ancient Houqie, Pinghou, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "鸲1". Also known as "Yu 1".
A genus of birds. Small body, long tail, beautiful feathers, short and pointed mouth. See "鸲掇", "鸲眼".
[②]［gōu］
["Jiyun" is cut and flat, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "鸲2".
See "Birds 2".
[③]［gòu］
["Jiyun" is cut, go, see. ]
Traditional characters for "鸲3".
Pheasant call.
Yu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鸜; Kangxi Strokes: 29; Page Number: Page 1504 No. 40
【Jade articles】Same as robin. Stork, the name of the bird. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] Yu Ji is not more than economical. [Chunqiu·25th Year of the Show] 鸜鹆 comes to the nest. [Lu Dianyun] Lier picks the end of his tongue and speaks words, very wise. [Li Shizhen said] This bird is good for bathing, and its eyes are Quran, hence the name. Re-surname again. The magpie. See 【Zhuangzi·Qiwulun】.
Yu
